info.location: Leiden University Medical Center & Delft University of Technology

extra.extracurricular activities: Extracurricular activities: Student member of the Board of Studies Graduation project: Design and characterization of an implantable system for shock free cardiac rhythm control. Defended on 09-09-2022.

extra.committees: Klushok-, Homepage-, Recruitment days-, Dies-, Pianotap-, Bar- and Winter Activity Committee

extra.Extracurricular activities: Organizing 4 Model United Nations of which one as conference manager, a seven-year involvement with technical support during theatre shows and a year of being a board member at the student association.

info.description: Design and assembly of printed circuit boards for practical assessments of the second-year students
Testimonial and reference available upon request

interest.col1: Apart from the practical assignments within my study, I enjoy doing projects at home. Examples are creating my own home automation system and product prototyping and development. During these projects I like to fully develop a solution including designing and 3d printing, laser cutting or CNC milling enclosures. As of recently this also includes building mobile apps and websites.
interest.col2: My non-electronics-related hobbies include bouldering and rock climbing and participating in LCKV (a camping association from Leiden). Iâ€™ve also spent a year volunteering as first aid support at events via the Dutch Red Cross and help organize the annual first year's weekend as part of the safety committee.
